/opt/rocm/llvm/bin/clang++ -fPIC  -std=gnu++17 -shared -Wl,-soname,librocjpeg.so -o librocjpeg.so CMakeFiles/rocjpeg.dir/src/rocjpeg_api.cpp.o CMakeFiles/rocjpeg.dir/src/rocjpeg_decoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/rocjpeg.dir/src/rocjpeg_parser.cpp.o CMakeFiles/rocjpeg.dir/src/rocjpeg_vaapi_decoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/rocjpeg.dir/utils/hip_kernel.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/hip/lib: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libva.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libva-drm.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdrm.so /opt/rocm/hip/lib/libamdhip64.so.5.6.50600 --hip-link --offload-arch=gfx908 --offload-arch=gfx90a --offload-arch=gfx940 --offload-arch=gfx1030 --offload-arch=gfx1031 --offload-arch=gfx1032 /opt/rocm-5.6.0/llvm/lib/clang/16.0.0/lib/linux/libclang_rt.builtins-x86_64.a
